message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $950,000. I'm confident this represents a fair deal considering the significant benefits it offers.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. However, $850,000 significantly undervalues the true worth and potential of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about we settle on $900,000? This reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
